alert.note: Alert for Jack; Parker; Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 3:13PM CDT until September 04 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Wise County in north central Texas... Southeastern Jack County in north central Texas... Northern Parker County in north central Texas... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 312 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Runaway Bay, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Springtown, Paradise, Poolville, Boonsville, Cottondale, Runaway Bay, Lake Bridgeport and Sanctuary. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
